title: Horseman

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, start to Decapitate a player. If they are hanged tomorrow, you will steal their head, cleaning them and giving you their roles and abilities. 2 uses.
- At night, you may throw a pumpkin at a player, silently roleblocking them (they are not informed of being roleblocked, and believe they slept peacefully. If they would've received night feedback from visiting, such as a sheriff, they simply don't.)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
